snippet.title: Purrfect Date - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy now on Steam: http://bit.ly/2vj3FQg

Cat-Courting Adventure Purrfect Date is now available on Steam!

Purrfect Date is a cross between a visual novel, dating sim, and dark British comedy. You, a human, will get to date cats and uncover the secrets of the mysterious Cat Island.

Throughout the game’s seven chapters, you'll adopt the roles of multiple freshly employed research assistants on an Island almost entirely populated by cats. Choose your own adventure as you romance talking cats, balance your stats and carry out your research into the dark and questionable history of the Island.

Drawing inspiration from trailblazing games such as Undertale, Dream Daddy, Hatoful Boyfriend, and Pony Island, there'll be lots of twists, turns and alternate playthroughs to keep you replaying.

UK-based indie Bae Team, will bring Purrfect Date to Windows PC, Mac and iOS this winter with the publishing support of the award-winning Bossa Studios (Surgeon Simulator, I am Bread).

Music by: OliverAge24 and Emil Lundin

Vocals by: 
OliverAge24 as OliverAge24
Dan Bull as Kibbles
Ruby-Mae Roberts as Trixie
Charon Bourke as Snooty Booty
Nick Henderson as Floofybutt
Secret Irish Friend as McMurphy

Lyrics by: OliverAge24, Ruby-Mae Roberts, Charon Bourke
Song mixed and mastered by OliverAge24

Storyboard and animation by: Crunchlins (https://www.youtube.com/user/Crunchlins)
Art by: Dan Lish

More from Purrfect Date:
http://www.purrfectdate.co.uk
http://www.twitter.com/PurrfectDate
http://www.facebook.com/PurrfectDate
http://www.instagram.com/PurrfectDate
http://www.youtube.com/PurrfectDate

Say hello! - team@purrfectdate.co.uk
Press - press@purrfectdate.co.uk
